segments.pli: “Na tāva, bhikkhave, akusalassa samāpatti hoti yāva saddhā paccupaṭṭhitā hoti kusalesu dhammesu.
segments.en: “Mendicants, you don’t become unskillful as long as faith is established in skillful qualities.

segments.pli: Yato ca kho, bhikkhave, saddhā antarahitā hoti, assaddhiyaṃ pariyuṭṭhāya tiṭṭhati;
segments.en: But when faith vanishes and faithlessness takes over,

segments.pli: Na tāva, bhikkhave, akusalassa samāpatti hoti yāva hirī paccupaṭṭhitā hoti kusalesu dhammesu.
segments.en: You don’t become unskillful as long as conscience … prudence … energy … wisdom is established in skillful qualities.

segments.pli: Yato ca kho, bhikkhave, hirī antarahitā hoti, ahirikaṃ pariyuṭṭhāya tiṭṭhati;
Na tāva, bhikkhave, akusalassa samāpatti hoti yāva ottappaṃ paccupaṭṭhitaṃ hoti kusalesu dhammesu.
Yato ca kho, bhikkhave, ottappaṃ antarahitaṃ hoti, anottappaṃ pariyuṭṭhāya tiṭṭhati;
Na tāva, bhikkhave, akusalassa samāpatti hoti yāva vīriyaṃ paccupaṭṭhitaṃ hoti kusalesu dhammesu.
Yato ca kho, bhikkhave, vīriyaṃ antarahitaṃ hoti, kosajjaṃ pariyuṭṭhāya tiṭṭhati;
Na tāva, bhikkhave, akusalassa samāpatti hoti yāva paññā paccupaṭṭhitā hoti kusalesu dhammesu.
Yato ca kho, bhikkhave, paññā antarahitā hoti, duppaññā pariyuṭṭhāya tiṭṭhati;
segments.en: But when wisdom vanishes and witlessness takes over,

sections.title: “Mendicants, you don’t become unskillful as long as faith…

suttaplex.blurb: Loss of foundational qualities leads to decline.
